name: CADQ Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A CADQ file is a file that has been encrypted by Cadq ransomware , which is malware distributed by cybercriminals. It contains a file, such as a .DOCX or .JPG file, that has been renamed and encrypted by the virus. CADQ files cannot be opened, and they likely cannot be decrypted.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
